name: Freezing Knights
description:
Freezing Knights is my first real attempt at creating a game. It took about 7 months to develop and was mainly inspired by that one RPG series with two plumbers🐢.

It originally released as part of the Twelve Days of Pico-8 Christmas 2022 event.

The game was made in the Pico-8 fantasy console, and is therefore limited to a 128x128 resolution and 16 colors.

Credits

Game by @tinyevilwizard
Music and OhCurtains intro by @ohcurtains
Testing / Feedback: Arthuria, Partybird, @ohcurtains, SmellyFishstiks, paraK00PA
